title: Silent Storm & Sentinels two games mega DVD RUS
description:
Hi to all, who like these games ss-series
This DVD included :
  1)Silent Storm
  2)Addon Silent Storm: Sentinels
  2)Mod only Hammer & Sickle in first edition by Novik. 

It's may be run on Win Vista and x64 XP

Note: All games have only RUSSIAN interface BUT ENGLISH sound

Games have cracks already. 
For install Silent Storm: just click "Install"!)) 
For install Sentinels: you must have Silent Storm game installed from this DVD before.
For install sickle mod: unpack folder must be root directory of Sentinels game.

Games will be install with editors (for mods developing) and editors manual (RUS).
If you want run any editor - you must be install MSSQL Desktop Engine (included in this image).  

Enjoy...
